preFooter.title: Open sourced on GitHub
preFooter.text: Puppet's source code is available for free on GitHub, and the underlying package is available on npm.

preFooter.title: Seriously—unlimited web automation jobs for the price of 1 cup of coffee per month.

components.title: No-code, natural language web automation
components.text: Puppet is the open-source no-code browser-based automation tool, powered by Google Chrome. Easily automate your workflows, scrape websites, and more.

faq.What are Secrets?: Secrets are a form of encrypted text storage that allow you to store sensitive information. For example, you can use Secrets to store your username and password to use Puppet when logging in to web services. Secrets are encrypted with AES-256 using a unique key specific to you.
faq.Do you offer discounts to students and t: If you have an educational email address, you receive the Puppet Master plan for free. Just sign up with your school/university email and it will be activated. If you have an unrecognized institution domain, contact us with your ID and we'll set you up.
